member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect
member.summary: Lighting effect creates an image that appears to be an illuminated non-reflective surface where the light source is limited to a directed cone of light. This effect uses the alpha channel as a height map, and lights it with a point light source. Note, height map is not supported with Composition.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Spot-diffuse lighting effect.
